Do you know where Brian is?
I saw him waiting for a bus at the bus stop.
I need to ask him about our math homework.
I called him several times, but he didn't answer.
He said that he was going to the hospital.
Coming back home, he will call you.
But I can't wait until he comes back.
Why don't you call Dana then?
I watched her walk into her house 5 minutes ago.
